title: Pattern For Embroidery, "LA JOCONDE"
medium:
Partly worked Mona Lisa (La Gioconda) in white threads. Background would have been openwork.
Technique: Buttonhole, stem, running and overcasting stitches following a printed     pattern on a plain weave foundation.
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Robert Mertz
description: Partly worked Mona Lisa (La Gioconda) in white threads. Background would have been openwork.
